explanation: The DFS loop was checking all 8 neighbors (including diagonals) because of the nested ranges for i and j. The problem expects 4-directional adjacency (up/down/left/right), so diagonal connections should not be counted. I fixed the single incorrect line by adding a condition that only allows moves where either i == 0 or j == 0, which restricts adjacency to the four cardinal directions while keeping every other line unchanged.
